text: Suggested Equipment Suitable bed/trolley & operating table Gel padding, wide strapping, table extensions/arm boards Forearm cuff or large BP cuff Ramping device, step for anaesthetist, difficult airway equipment, ventilator capable of PEEP and pressure modes. Hover mattress or equivalent. Long spinal, regional and vascular needles. Ultrasound machine. Depth of anaesthesia and neuromuscular monitoring. Enough staff to move patient.
